title: List Length Calculation
description: This function calculates the number of elements in a list defined by a separator character. The input list comes as a string, and the function counts how many times the separator appears in it, returning the total count as the length of the list.
name: LIST_LEN

input.name: SEP
input.description: The separator byte used to mark the boundaries between elements in the list.

output.name: LIST_LEN
output.description: The total number of elements in the list as determined by counting the occurrences of the separator.

in/out.name: LIST
in/out.description: The string representation of the list where elements are separated by the specified separator.

return_value.description: The return value indicates the count of elements in the list based on the separator provided.
